title: Number of casinos worldwide 2011 by region
summary: This chart shows the Number of casinos conducted by worldwide in a 2011 by .
\\n From the chart we see that the Eastern_Europe Country was the Number casinos Country in the by with 1623 casinos .
The next Country to make the most casinos was the South_America Country with 199 casinos closely followed by Middle_East with 5 casinos .
gold: This statistic shows the number of casinos worldwide by region in 2011 . In that year , North America was the region with the most casinos with 1,623 . In 2016 , the U.S. casino gaming market had revenues of 71.1 billion U.S. dollars .
